ctl:suite.name: wmts:te-status-dev-suite
ctl:suite.ctl:title: TEAM Engine Test Status Development Test
ctl:suite.ctl:description: Lots of tests of test status

ctl:test.name: wmts:Start
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All TEAM Engine Test Status Inheritance Conditions are tested

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryTests
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All Mandatory Test Status Inheritance Conditions are tested

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryContinueParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Continue status of Mandatory test causes Inherited Failure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryContinueChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Continue status of Mandatory test causes Inherited Failure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryBestPracticeParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: BestPractice status of Mandatory tests causes no change in status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryBestPracticeChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: BestPractice status of Mandatory tests causes no change in status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryPassedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Pass status of Mandatory tests causes Pass status of parent test with BestPractice default status

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryPassedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Pass status of Mandatory tests causes Pass status of parent test with BestPractice default status

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryNotTestedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: NotTested status of Mandatory tests causes Inherited Failure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryNotTestedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: NotTested status of Mandatory tests causes Inherited Failure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryWarningParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Warning status of Mandatory tests causes Inherited Failure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryWarningChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Warning status of Mandatory tests causes Inherited Failure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatorySkippedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Skipped status of Mandatory tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatorySkippedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Skipped status of Mandatory tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryFailedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of Mandatory tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryFailedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of Mandatory tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedTests
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All MandatoryIfImplemented Test Status Inheritance Conditions are tested

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedContinueParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Continue status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedContinueChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Continue status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedBestPracticeParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: BestPractice status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes no change in status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedBestPracticeChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: BestPractice status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes no change in status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedPassedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Passed status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes Passed status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedPassedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Passed status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes Passed status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedNotTestedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: NotTested status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedNotTestedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: NotTested status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedWarningParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Warning status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedWarningChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Warning status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedSkippedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Skipped status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes no change in status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedSkippedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Skipped status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes no change in status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedFailedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:MandatoryIfImplementedFailedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of MandatoryIfImplemented tests causes InheritedFailure status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalTests
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All Optional Test Status Inheritance Conditions are tested

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalContinueParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Continue status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalContinueChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Continue status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalBestPracticeParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: BestPractice status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalBestPracticeChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: BestPractice status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalPassedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Passed status of Optional tests causes Passed status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalPassedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Passed status of Optional tests causes Passed status of parent test with default status of BestPractice

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalNotTestedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: NotTested status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalNotTestedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: NotTested status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalWarningParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Warning status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalWarningChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Warning status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalSkippedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Skipped status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalSkippedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Skipped status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalFailedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OptionalFailedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of Optional tests causes no change to status of parent test

ctl:test.name: wmts:OTMandatoryFailedParent
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of Mandatory tests causes Inherited Failure of parent test

ctl:code.ctl:message: Mandatory Failed Parent With Optional Parent

ctl:test.name: wmts:OTMandatoryFailedChild
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Failed status of Mandatory tests causes Inherited Failure of parent test
